name: STIX/TAXII Plugin
description: The STIX/TAXII plugin polls TAXII feeds and extracts observables from them. This plugin does not support sharing of indicators to TAXII feeds.

configuration.label: Username
configuration.description: Username required for authentication if any.

configuration.label: Password
configuration.description: Password required for authentication if any.

configuration.label: Collection Names
configuration.description: Collections (CSV) from which data need to fetch. Leave empty to fetch data from all of the collections.

configuration.label: Initial Range (in days)
configuration.description: Number of days to pull the data for the initial run.

configuration.label: Type of Threat data to pull
configuration.description: Type of Threat data to pull. Allowed values are Both, Malware and URL(For Malsite data).

configuration.label: Severity
configuration.description: Only indicators with matching severity will be saved.

configuration.label: Reputation
configuration.description: Only indicators with reputation equal to or greater than this will be saved.
